page.title: 01PARTRIDGE GREEN GAZETTEER.
page.content: PARTRIDGE GREEN is a small but expanding village centred around the flint church of ST.MICHAEL'S,9 miles south of HORSHAM,WEST SUSSEX and east of the A24 LONDON TO WORTHING road.There are two INDUSTRIAL ESTATES and essential SHOPS and SERVICES but most residents shop and WORK at one of the nearest big towns BRIGHTON,CRAWLEY WORTHING,HORSHAM or even the CITY OF LONDON.The village has it's old part and elderly,life-long residents but most residents are young families who live on one of the village's four new ESTATES and whose children attend a focal point in the community,the SCHOOL.People may join the many CLUBS and GROUPS,enjoy the peace and WILDLIFE of the surrounding countryside or partake of a meal and drink in one of the village's two PUBLIC HOUSES.
